multimonster.systemadministration
Interface SystemAdministrationFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
SystemAdministrationImplBean
public interface SystemAdministrationFacade

This is the interface for the System-component SystemAdministration All other system-components should use only this interface when accessing Systemadministration

Author:
Marc Iseler

Method Summary
